summary.span: 通过使用用户定义的模板来显示数据源的值。

span.span: Displays the values of a data source by using user-defined templates.

summary.span: 控件使用户能够选择、排序、删除、编辑和插入记录。

span.span: The control enables users to select, sort, delete, edit, and insert records.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [模板Templates](#templates) - [绑定到数据源Binding to a Data Source](#binding_to_a_data_source) - [数据操作Data Operations](#data_operations) - [事件Events](#Events) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件用于显示数据源中的值。The control is used to display the values from a data source. 它类似于控件，只不过它使用用户定义的模板而不是行字段将显示数据。It resembles the control, except that it displays data by using user-defined templates instead of row fields. 创建您自己的模板可以让你更灵活地控制数据的显示方式。Creating your own templates gives you more flexibility in controlling how the data is displayed. 具有源代码的 Visual Studio 项目是可随附于本主题：[下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=199759)。A Visual Studio project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=199759). 控件支持以下功能：The control supports the following features: - 例如绑定到数据源控件的支持， ，和。Support for binding to data source controls such as , , and . - 通过用户定义的模板和样式的可自定义外观。Customizable appearance through user-defined templates and styles. - 内置排序功能。Built-in sorting capabilities. - 内置更新和删除功能。Built-in update and delete capabilities. - 内置插入功能。Built-in insert capabilities. - 使用分页功能的支持控件。Support for paging capabilities by using a control. - 内置项选择功能。Built-in item selection capabilities. - 以编程方式访问对象模型，以便动态设置属性，处理事件，以及其他操作。Programmatic access to the object model to dynamically set properties, handle events, and so on. - 多个键字段。Multiple key fields. 若要了解有关 ASP.NET 中提供其他数据绑定控件，请参阅[数据绑定 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9cf026e-d8b8-49f8-a3c4-64de2edbbb96)。To learn about other data-bound controls that are available in ASP.NET, see [Data-Bound Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9cf026e-d8b8-49f8-a3c4-64de2edbbb96). ## 模板Templates 为了使控件来显示内容，你必须创建该控件的不同部分的模板。In order for the control to display content, you must create templates for different parts of the control. 是必需的。The is required. 所有其他模板是可选的。All other templates are optional. 属性不是必需。The property is not required. 但是，必须创建一个模板，用于在其中配置该控件的模式。However, you must create a template for the mode in which the control is configured. 例如，必须具有支持插入记录的控件定义模板。For example, a control that supports inserting records must have an template defined. 下表列出了可以为创建的模板控件。The following table lists the templates that you can create for the control. |模板类型Template type|描述Description| |-------------------|-----------------| ||定义容器对象，例如根模板`table`， `div`，或`span`元素中，将包含在中定义的内容或模板。The root template that defines a container object, such as a `table`, `div`, or `span` element, that will contain the content defined in the or template. 它还可能包含对象。It might also contain a object.| ||定义要显示的单个项目的数据绑定内容。Defines the data-bound content to display for individual items.| ||定义要呈现各个项之间的内容。Defines the content to render between individual items.| ||定义容器对象，例如表行 (`tr`)， `div`，或`span`元素中，将包含在中定义的内容和模板。Defines a container object, such as a table row (`tr`), `div`, or `span` element, that will contain the content defined in the and templates. 指定的组中显示的项数属性。The number of items that are displayed in a group is specified by the property.| ||定义要呈现的项的组之间的内容。Defines the content to render between groups of items.| ||定义要呈现为一个空的内容项使用模板。Defines the content to render for an empty item when a template is used. 例如，如果属性设置为 5，并从数据源返回的总项数为 8，显示的数据的最后一组控件将包含由指定的三个项模板，然后两个项所指定的模板。For example, if the property is set to 5, and the total number of items returned from the data source is 8, the last group of data displayed by the control will contain three items as specified by the template, and two items as specified by the template.| ||定义要呈现的数据源未返回数据时的内容。Defines the content to render if the data source returns no data.| ||定义要呈现为所选的数据项来区分来自其他项的选定的项的内容。Defines the content to render for the selected data item to differentiate the selected item from other items.| ||定义要呈现，以便使其更易于区分连续项交替项的内容。Defines the content to render for alternating items to make it easier to distinguish between consecutive items.| ||定义要呈现时正在编辑的项的内容。Defines the content to render when an item is being edited. 模板呈现来代替正在编辑的数据项的模板。The template is rendered in place of the template for the data item that is being edited.| ||定义要呈现要插入项的内容。Defines the content to render to insert an item. 模板呈现来代替模板开始或末尾的项的情况下会显示控件。The template is rendered in place of an template at either the start or at the end of the items that are displayed by the control. 您可以指定的位置通过使用呈现模板属性的控件。You can specify where the template is rendered by using the property of the control.| 若要在模板中显示字段的值如，使用数据绑定表达式。To display the value of a field in a template such as , you use a data-binding expression. 有关数据绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定表达式概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。For more information about data-binding expressions, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a). 若要将绑定中的输入的控件和模板为数据源的字段，则可以使用双向绑定表达式。To bind input controls in the and templates to fields of a data source, you can use two-way binding expressions. 这使控件自动提取更新的输入控件的值或插入操作。This enables the control to automatically extract the values of the input control for an update or insert operation. 双向绑定表达式还可以使输入的控件中自动显示字段的原始值。Two-way binding expressions also enable input controls in an to automatically display the original field values. 有关双向绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information about two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). ## 绑定到数据源Binding to a Data Source 可以将绑定到数据源控件的控件 (如控制或控件) 或实现任何数据源集合接口，如， ， ，或其他集合类型。You can bind the control to a data source control (such as the control or control) or to any data source collection that implements the interface, such as , , , or other collection types. 使用以下方法之一将绑定到适当的数据源类型的控件：Use one of the following methods to bind the control to the appropriate data source type: - 若要将绑定到数据源控件，设置的属性控制对数据源控件的值。To bind to a data source control, set the property of the control to the value of the data source control. 控件自动将绑定到指定的数据源控件，并且可以充分利用数据源控件的功能来执行排序、 插入、 更新、 删除和分页功能。The control automatically binds to the specified data source control and can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities to perform sorting, inserting, updating, deleting, and paging functionality. 这是要将绑定到数据的首选的方法。This is the preferred method to bind to data. - 若要绑定到实现的数据源接口，以编程方式设置的属性控制到数据源，然后调用方法。To bind to a data source that implements the interface, programmatically set the property of the control to the data source, and then call the method. 使用此方法时控件不提供内置排序、 更新、 删除和分页功能。When you use this technique, the control does not provide built-in sorting, updating, deleting, and paging functionality. 通过使用相应的事件，必须提供此功能。You must provide this functionality by using the appropriate event. 有关数据绑定的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 数据访问内容映射](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2)。For more information about data binding, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2). > [!NOTE] > 控件可用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。The control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before you display it in the application. 我们强烈建议，值进行 HTML 编码尽可能之前此控件中显示。We strongly recommend that values be HTML-encoded whenever possible before they are displayed in this control. ASP.NET 提供了输入的请求验证功能，以便在用户输入的脚本块和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to help block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还可用于检查用户输入。You can also use validation server controls to check user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证控件简介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190)。For more information, see [Introduction to the Validation Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190). ## 数据操作Data Operations 当控件绑定到数据源控件，控件可以利用数据源控件的功能并提供自动排序、 插入、 更新和删除功能。When the control is bound to a data source control, the control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic sort, insert, update, and delete functionality. > [!NOTE] > 控件可以提供对排序、 插入、 更新和删除与其他类型的数据源的支持。The control can provide support for sorting, inserting, updating, and deleting with other types of data sources. 但是，为了实现这些操作，您必须创建相应的事件处理程序中的代码。However, in order to implement these operations, you must create code in an appropriate event handler. 因为控件使用模板，它不提供用于自动生成按钮来执行 update、 delete、 insert、 排序，或选择操作的方法。Because the control uses templates, it does not provide a way to automatically generate buttons to perform update, delete, insert, sort, or select operations. 您必须手动将这些按钮包括在适当的模板。You must manually include these buttons in the appropriate template. 控件可识别某些按钮，其属性设置为特定值。The control recognizes certain buttons whose property is set to a specific value. 下表列出了按钮的控件可识别及其功能。The following table lists the buttons that the control recognizes and their functions. |ButtonButton|CommandName 值CommandName value|描述Description| |------------|-----------------------|-----------------| |取消Cancel|"取消""Cancel"|取消编辑或插入操作。Cancels an edit or insert operation. 引发 事件。Raises the event.| |删除Delete|“Delete”"Delete"|从数据源中删除当前记录。Deletes the current record from the data source. 将引发和事件。Raises the and events.| |选择Select|"选择""Select"|集属性设置为的项的属性值。Sets the property to the property value for the item. 呈现的项模板。Renders the template for the item. 将引发和事件。Raises the and events.| |EditEdit|"编辑""Edit"|使项进入编辑模式。Puts the item in edit mode. 呈现的项模板。Renders the template for the item. 引发 事件。Raises the event.| |InsertInsert|"插入""Insert"|将从绑定的值插入到数据源的模板。Inserts the bound values from the template into the data source. 将引发和事件。Raises the and events.| |更新Update|"更新""Update"|使用中的绑定值更新数据源中的当前记录模板。Updates the current record in the data source with the bound values from the template. 将引发和事件。Raises the and events.| |排序Sort|"排序""Sort"|中列出的列进行排序`CommandArgument`按钮的属性。Sorts the columns listed in the `CommandArgument` property of the button. 将引发和事件。Raises the and events.| 与删除按钮 （它立即删除当前数据项） 不同，单击编辑按钮，控件在编辑模式下显示当前项。Unlike the Delete button (which deletes the current data item immediately), when the Edit button is clicked, the control displays the current item in edit mode. 在编辑模式下中, 包含的内容属性显示为当前数据项。In edit mode, the content that is contained in the property is displayed for the current data item. 通常情况下，在编辑项模板中，编辑按钮是更新和替换取消按钮。Typically, in the edit item template, the Edit button is replaced with an Update and a Cancel button. 输入适合于字段的数据类型的控件 (如或控件) 通常还会显示用户若要修改的字段的值。Input controls that are appropriate for the field's data type (such as a or control) also usually display a field's value for a user to modify. 单击更新按钮更新数据源中的记录，并单击取消按钮取消编辑操作。Clicking the Update button updates the record in the data source, and clicking the Cancel button cancels the edit operation. 插入功能启用时属性设置为或。The insert functionality is enabled when the property is set to or . 此属性定义在何处模板呈现的插入项。This property defines where the template is rendered for the insert item. 插入项模板通常包括插入和取消按钮，并为空的输入的控件显示用户输入新记录的值。The insert item template typically includes an Insert and a Cancel button, and empty input controls are displayed for users to enter the values for the new record. 单击插入按钮在数据源中插入记录，并单击取消按钮清除所有字段。Clicking the Insert button inserts the record in the data source, and clicking the Cancel button clears all the fields. ### 排序Sorting 控件使用户可以通过单击排序按钮对项进行排序。The control enables users to sort the items by clicking the Sort button. 在中定义排序功能`CommandArgument`属性包含要进行排序的列的按钮。Sort functionality is defined in the `CommandArgument` property of the button that contains the columns to be sorted. ### 分页Paging 而不是在同一时间显示数据源中的所有记录控件可以分解为页的记录。Instead of displaying all the records from the data source at the same time, the control can break the records into pages. 若要启用分页，将相关联控件，其控件。To enable paging, associate a control with the control. 然后，插入控件内部模板。Then insert a control inside the template. 或者，如果控件是外部控件，将设置属性设置为的控件。Alternatively, if the control is outside the control, set the property to the of the control. ## 事件Events 下表列出了支持的事件控件。The following table lists the events that are supported by the control. |事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||发生时取消按钮 (按钮使用其`CommandName`属性设置为"Cancel") 单击后，之前控件取消插入或编辑操作。Occurs when the Cancel button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Cancel") is clicked, but before the control cancels the insert or edit operation. 此事件通常用于停止取消操作。This event is often used to stop the cancel operation.| ||在 控件中单击某个按钮时发生。Occurs when a button is clicked in the control. 此事件通常用于在控件中单击的按钮时执行自定义任务。This event is often used to perform a custom task when a button is clicked in the control.| ||在中创建新项时发生控件。Occurs when a new item is created in the control. 此事件通常用于创建项目时，修改项的内容。This event is often used to modify the content of an item when the item is created.| ||数据项绑定到中的数据时发生控件。Occurs when a data item is bound to data in the control. 此事件通常用于修改项的内容项绑定到数据时。This event is often used to modify the content of an item when the item is bound to data.| ||删除按钮时，会发生 (与按钮及其`CommandName`属性设置为"删除") 单击或调用方法时后,控件从数据源中删除记录。Occurs when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") is clicked or the method is called, after the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用于检查删除操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.| ||删除按钮时，会发生 (与按钮及其`CommandName`属性设置为"删除") 单击或调用方法时，之前控件从数据源中删除记录。Occurs when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") is clicked or the method is called, but before the control deletes the record from the data source. 此事件通常用于确认或取消删除操作。This event is often used to confirm or cancel the delete operation.| ||时发生的编辑按钮 (按钮使用其`CommandName`属性设置为"编辑") 单击后，之前控件进入编辑模式。Occurs when an Edit button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Edit") is clicked, but before the control enters edit mode. 此事件通常用于取消编辑操作。This event is often used to cancel the editing operation.| ||时发生的插入按钮 (按钮使用其`CommandName`属性设置为"插入") 单击或调用方法时后,控件从数据源中插入新记录。Occurs when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") is clicked or the method is called, after the control inserts the new record from the data source. 此事件通常用于检查 insert 操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the insert operation.| ||时发生的插入按钮 (按钮使用其`CommandName`属性设置为"插入") 单击或调用方法时，之前控件插入记录。Occurs when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") is clicked or the method is called, but before the control inserts the record. 此事件通常用于取消插入操作或更改或验证新项的值。This event is often used to cancel the insert operation or change or validate the values of the new item.| ||时发生的更新按钮 (按钮使用其`CommandName`属性设置为"更新") 单击或调用方法，之后控件更新的记录。Occurs when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") is clicked or the method is called, after the control updates the record. 此事件通常用于检查更新操作的结果。This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.| ||时发生的更新按钮 (按钮使用其`CommandName`属性设置为"更新") 单击或调用方法时，之前控件更新的记录。Occurs when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") is clicked or the method is called, but before the control updates the record. 此事件通常用于取消更新操作或更改或编辑的项的值进行验证。This event is often used to cancel the updating operation or change or validate the values of the edited item.| ||在 控件中创建 模板后发生。Occurs when the template is created in a control. 此事件通常用于创建模板后执行的任务。This event is often used to perform a task after the template is created.| ||在页属性更改且 控件设置新值之后发生。Occurs when the page properties change, after the control sets the new values.| ||之前的数据页属性更改时发生控件设置新值。Occurs when the data-page properties change, but before the control sets the new values.| ||选择按钮时发生 (一个具有按钮及其`CommandName`属性设置为"Select") 单击后后,控件处理选择操作。Occurs when a Select button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Select") is clicked, after the control handles the select operation. 此事件通常用于在控件中选择项后执行自定义任务。This event is often used to perform a custom task after an item is selected in the control.| ||选择按钮时发生 (一个具有按钮及其`CommandName`属性设置为"Select") 单击后，之前控件处理选择操作。Occurs when a Select button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Select") is clicked, but before the control handles the select operation. 此事件通常用于取消选择的操作。This event is often used to cancel the select operation.| ||排序按钮时，会发生 (与按钮及其`CommandName`属性设置为"排序") 单击或调用方法，之后控件处理排序操作。Occurs when a Sort button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Sort") is clicked or the method is called, after the control handles the sort operation. 此事件通常用于执行自定义任务后用户单击排序按钮，并且数据已排序。This event is typically used to perform a custom task after a user clicks a Sort button and the data has been sorted.| ||排序按钮时，会发生 (一个具有按钮及其`CommandName`属性设置为"排序") 单击或调用方法时，之前控件处理排序操作。Occurs when a Sort button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Sort") is clicked or the method is called, but before the control handles the sort operation. 若要取消排序操作或执行自定义排序例程，通常使用此事件。This event is often used to cancel the sorting operation or to perform a custom sorting routine.| ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用控件来显示通过使用 HTML 表的数据库中的记录。The following example shows how to use the control to display records from a database by using an HTML table. 通过使用检索的值控件。The values are retrieved by using a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView_Simple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView_Simple/CS/ListViewSimpleCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView_Simple#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView_Simple/VB/ListViewSimpleVB.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用控件通过使用在数据流布局中显示值`div`元素。The following example shows how to use the control to display values in a flow layout by using the `div` element. 通过使用检索的值控件。The values are retrieved by using a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来定义交替数据项的自定义用户界面 (UI)。Use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the alternating data item. 模板通常包含相同的控件和内容作为项的模板，但具有不同的外观来区分。The template usually contains the same controls and content as the template, but with a different appearance to distinguish items. 若要以声明方式指定自定义模板，添加`AlternatingItemTemplate`元素内的控件。To specify the custom template declaratively, add an `AlternatingItemTemplate` element inside the control. 然后添加控件和内容的开始和结束之间``标记。Then add controls and content between the opening and closing `` tags. 若要显示的数据源中的字段值，请使用数据绑定表达式。To display the field values from the data source, use a data-binding expression. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定表达式概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。For more information, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a). 若要创建自动选择、 删除和编辑操作的按钮，向模板添加一个按钮控件。To create buttons that automatically select, delete, and edit operations, add a button control to the template. 设置其下表中列出的属性的值之一。Set its property to one of the values listed in the following table. |按钮类型Button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-----------------|-----------------------| |删除Delete|“Delete”"Delete"| |EditEdit|"编辑""Edit"| |选择Select|"选择""Select"| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用模板来定义数据中交替项的样式控件。The following example shows how to use the template to define the style for alternating data items in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.AlternatingItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.AlternatingItemTemplate/CS/ListViewAlternatingItemTemplateCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.AlternatingItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.AlternatingItemTemplate/VB/ListViewAlternatingItemTemplateVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个数组，该数组包含了显示在 控件中的项的主键字段的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets an array that contains the names of the primary key fields for the items displayed in a control.

value.span: 一个数组，其中包含了显示在 控件中的项的主键字段的名称。

span.span: An array that contains the names of the primary key fields for the items displayed in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以指定字段或表示数据源的主键的字段。Use the property to specify the field or fields that represent the primary key of the data source. 若要以声明方式设置此属性，使用逗号分隔的字段名称列表。To set this property declaratively, use a comma-separated list of field names. 当设置属性，则控件自动填充其中指定的字段或字段的值的集合。When the property is set, the control automatically populates its collection with the values from the specified field or fields. 这提供了方便地访问每个项的主键。This provides a convenient way to access the primary keys of each item. > [!IMPORTANT] > 控件的控件状态字段中存储键字段值。The control stores key field values in the control-state field. 如果这些值包含敏感信息，我们建议您通过设置启用视图状态加密属性设置为`ViewStateEncryptionMode.Always`。If these values contain sensitive information, we recommend that you enable view-state encryption by setting the property to `ViewStateEncryptionMode.Always`. 必须设置自动更新和删除的功能属性控制工作。You must set the property for the automatic updating and deleting features of the control to work. 这些键字段的值被传递给数据源控件，以匹配要更新或删除的项。The values of these key fields are passed to the data source control in order to match the item to update or delete. 通过使用密钥指定为数据的字段属性在更新期间传递到数据源控件和删除操作使用`Keys`集合。Fields that are specified as data keys by using the property are passed to the data source control during update and delete operations by using the `Keys` collection. 数据键字段传递到数据源控件中，即使它们未绑定到模板中的控件。Data key fields are passed to the data source control even if they are not bound to controls in a template. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定的键字段的数据源。The following example shows how to use the property to specify the key field of the data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemCommand#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemCommand/CS/ListViewItemCommandCS.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemCommand#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemCommand/VB/ListViewItemCommandVB.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置属性，则控件自动创建控件中每个项的对象。When the property is set, the control automatically creates a object for each item in the control. 对象包含的字段或字段中指定的值属性。The object contains the values of the field or fields that are specified in the property. 随后将对象添加到控件的集合。The objects are then added to the control's collection. 使用属性来检索对象中的特定数据项控件。Use the property to retrieve the object for a specific data item in the control. 可以使用属性来检索当前选定项的对象。You can use the property to retrieve the object for the currently selected item. 此外可以使用属性直接检索当前选定项的数据键值。You can also use the property to retrieve the data-key value for the currently selected item directly. 可以使用属性来检索为其命令按钮被单击的项的对象。You can use the property to retrieve the object for the item for which a command button was clicked. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定中的项的数据键值控件。The following example shows how to use the property to determine the data-key values for the items in a control. 它还演示如何以保留用户选择基于而不是使用索引的默认行为的数据项。It also shows how to preserve the user selection based on a data item instead of the default behavior that uses the index. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged/CS/ListViewItemSelectedIndexChanged2CS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged/VB/ListViewItemSelectedIndexChanged2VB.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用属性以编程方式指定或确定中的哪一项控件，以编辑。You can use the property to programmatically specify or determine which item in a control to edit. 当此属性设置为控件中的项的索引时，该项目将显示处于编辑模式。When this property is set to the index of an item in the control, that item is displayed in edit mode. 在编辑模式下，通过使用呈现的项模板而不是模板。In edit mode, the item is rendered by using the template instead of the template. 您可以填充与数据绑定控件可以使用户能够修改项的值。You can populate the with data-bound controls to enable users to modify values for the item. 若要从编辑模式下，若要显示模式切换，请将此属性设置为-1。To switch from edit mode to display mode, set this property to -1. 时必须以编程方式确定正在编辑的项，或添加到自定义编辑功能时，通常使用属性控件。The property is typically used when you have to programmatically determine which item is being edited, or when you are adding custom editing functionality to the control. 控件具有一个内置的编辑功能自动将货物放在编辑模式下，如果将按钮添加到项模板，其属性设置为`Edit`。The control has a built-in editing feature that automatically puts an item in edit mode if you add a button to the item template whose property is set to `Edit`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定某个项是否处于编辑模式中控件。The following example shows how to use the property to determine whether an item is in edit mode in the control. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem/CS/ListViewDataItemDataItemCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem/VB/ListViewDataItemDataItemVB.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问处于编辑模式中的项控件。Use the property to access the item that is in edit mode in a control. 编辑项的内容定义由属性。The content of an edit item is defined by the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检索是在编辑模式下使用的项属性来访问控件中包含的模板。The following example shows how to retrieve the item that is in edit mode by using the property to access controls that are contained in the template. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). span.span: Gets or sets the custom content for the item in edit mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来定义自定义用户界面 (UI) 中编辑模式的项。Use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the item in edit mode. 模板通常包含要更新现有记录的值的用户的输入的控件。The template usually contains the input controls for the user to update the values of an existing record. 它通常还包含用于更新的记录和取消更新操作的按钮。It also usually contains buttons to update the record and to cancel the update operation. 若要以声明方式指定自定义模板，添加`EditItemTemplate`元素内的控件。To specify the custom template declaratively, add an `EditItemTemplate` element inside the control. 然后添加的内容和控件，模板`EditItemTemplate`元素。Then add the contents and controls for template to the `EditItemTemplate` element. 可以使用双向绑定表达式将字段关联的输入控件。You can associate a field with an input control by using a two-way binding expression. 这使控件在编辑模式中的项关联的输入控件中自动显示原始字段值。This enables the control to automatically display the original field value in the associated input control for the item in edit mode. 当更新记录时，控件可以自动从关联的输入控件提取更新的字段值。When a record is updated, the control can automatically extract the updated field value from the associated input control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定表达式概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。For more information, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a). 若要创建执行内置的取消和更新操作的按钮，向模板添加一个按钮控件。To create buttons that perform the built-in cancel and update operations, add a button control to the template. 设置其下表中列出的属性的值之一。Set its property to one of the values listed in the following table. |按钮类型Button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-----------------|-----------------------| |取消Cancel|"取消""Cancel"| |更新Update|"更新""Update"| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在编辑模式中定义自定义项模板。The following example shows how to define a custom template for the item in edit mode. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以指定如何选定的行时保留控件是否处于分页模式。You can specify how selected rows are persisted when the control is in paging mode. 默认情况下，行选择基于行索引。By default, row selection is based on row index. 每一页上选择的相同行 （例如，第三个行）。The same row (for example, the third row) is selected on each page. 或者，可以启用暂留基于所选行的数据键。Alternatively, you can enable persistence based on the data key of the selected row. 在这种情况下，如果你选择第 3 行第 1 页上的，并将移动到第 2 页，在第 2 页不选择任何行。In that case, if you select row 3 on page 1 and you move to page 2, no row is selected on page 2. 如果您移到第 1 页中，第 3 行仍处于选中状态。If you move back to page 1, row 3 is still selected. 若要启用此功能，请将此属性设置为`true`。To enable this functionality, set this property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 在版本 2.0、 3.0 和 3.5 ASP.NET 中，行选择基于仅行索引。In versions 2.0, 3.0, and 3.5 of ASP.NET, row selection was based only on row index. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 4 中的行选择基于索引的向后兼容性。By default, row selection in ASP.NET 4 is based on index for backward compatibility.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要组合在一起的项号控件。Use the property to specify the number of items to be grouped together in the control. （换句话说，这指定要为每个组控件显示的项的数目）。对于每个组中，控件的内容呈现模板和项占位符替换为实际项目内容。(In other words, this specifies the number of items to display for each group of the control.) For each group, the control renders the contents of the template and replaces the item placeholder with the actual item content. 做到这一点的尽可能多地由定义的项的数目属性。It does this as many times as the number of items defined by the property. 可以使用与模板来创建在平铺的布局控件。You can use with the template to create a tiled layout in the control. 在平铺的表布局中，则会重复项水平行中。In a tiled table layout, the items are repeated horizontally in a row. 指定的重复项的次数属性。The numbers of times that an item is repeated is specified by the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建在平铺的布局控件中的使用属性。The following example shows how to create a tiled layout in the control by using the property. 它还演示如何以编程方式更改此属性。It also shows how to change this property programmatically. summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中的组之间的分隔符的用户定义内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the user-defined content for the separator between groups in a control.

value.span: 一个对象，包含组分隔符的自定义内容。

span.span: An object that contains the custom content for the group separator.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分隔符，可将具有每个组之间的自定义内容的元素。The separator enables you to put an element that has custom content between each group. 控件，然后或者呈现内容和内容。The control then alternately renders the content and the content. 始终最后呈现的内容。The content is always rendered last. 请确保定义中的整个行的内容模板，因为控件呈现内的内容模板。Make sure that you define the content for the whole row in the template, because the control renders the content inside the template. 例如中的组控件可能会创建使用表行 (`tr`) 元素。For example, the groups in the control might be created by using a table row (`tr`) element. 如果属性设置为 3，`colspan`属性必须设置为中的 3模板。If the property is set to 3, the `colspan` attribute must be set to 3 in the template. 若要指定以声明方式为分隔符的模板，添加`GroupSeparatorTemplate`元素内的控件。To specify a template declaratively for the separator, add a `GroupSeparatorTemplate` element inside the control. 然后可以添加到模板的内容`GroupSeparatorTemplate`元素。You can then add the contents of the template to the `GroupSeparatorTemplate` element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建中的组分隔符控件中的使用属性。The following example shows how to create a group separator in the control by using the property. span.span: Gets or sets the user-defined content for the group container in a control.

value.span: 一个对象，包含 控件中的组容器的自定义内容。

span.span: An object that contains the custom content for the group container in a control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来创建在平铺的布局控件。Use the property to create a tiled layout in the control. 在平铺的表布局中，则会重复项水平行中。In a tiled table layout, the items are repeated horizontally in a row. 指定的重复项的次数属性。The numbers of times that an item is repeated is specified by the property. 若要指定以声明方式的组容器的模板，添加`GroupTemplate`元素内的控件。To specify a template declaratively for the group container, add a `GroupTemplate` element inside the control. 然后可以添加到模板的内容`GroupTemplate`元素。You can then add the contents of the template to the `GroupTemplate` element. 属性必须包含的数据项，如表格单元格的占位符 (`td`)， `div`，或`span`元素。The property must include a placeholder for the data item, such as a table cell (`td`), `div`, or `span` element. 必须具有此占位符`runat`属性设置为"server"和`ID`属性设置的值为属性。This placeholder must have the `runat` attribute set to "server" and the `ID` attribute set to the value of the property. 在运行时，控件将使用为每个项中定义的内容替换占位符和模板。At run time, the control replaces the placeholder with the content that is defined for each item in the and templates. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建在平铺的布局控件中的使用属性。The following example shows how to create a tiled layout in the control by using the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问的插入项控件。Use the property to access the insert item of a control. 插入项是对象，其等同于。An insert item is a object whose is equal to . 插入项的内容定义由属性。The content of an insert item is defined by the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过使用获取的插入项属性来访问控件中包含的模板。The following example shows how to get the insert item by using the property to access controls that are contained in the template. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含接受用户输入，这是潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains text boxes that accept user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了可用的项的位置值。The following table lists the available item position values. |行类型Row type|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||呈现模板中的第一项为控件。Renders the template as the first item in the control.| ||呈现模板中的最后一项为控件。Renders the template as the last item in the control.| ||不呈现模板。Does not render the template.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何配置控件来显示模板。The following example shows how to configure a control to display the template. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分事件。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中的插入项的自定义内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the custom content for an insert item in the control.

value.span: 一个对象，包含 控件中的插入项的自定义内容。

span.span: An object that contains the custom content for the insert item in the control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来定义自定义用户界面 (UI) 中插入项控件。Use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the insert item in the control. 此 UI 的开头或末尾显示的项的呈现。This UI is rendered either at the start or at the end of the displayed items. 指定在其中使用呈现的 UI属性。You specify where the UI is rendered by using the property. 模板通常包含用户输入一条新记录的值的输入的控件。The template usually contains the input controls for the user to enter the values for a new record. 它通常还包含按钮或超链接用于插入记录和取消插入操作。It also usually contains buttons or hyperlinks to insert the record and to cancel the insert operation. 若要以声明方式指定自定义模板，添加`InsertItemTemplate`元素内的`ListView`元素。To specify the custom template declaratively, add an `InsertItemTemplate` element inside the `ListView` element. 然后可以添加到模板的内容`InsertItemTemplate`元素。You can then add the contents of the template to the `InsertItemTemplate` element. 可以使用双向绑定表达式将字段关联的输入控件。You can associate a field with an input control by using a two-way binding expression. 当插入一条记录时，控件自动从关联的输入控件中提取字段值。When a record is inserted, the control automatically extracts the field value from the associated input control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定表达式概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。For more information, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a). 若要创建用于执行内置的取消和插入操作的按钮，向模板添加一个按钮控件。To create buttons that perform the built-in cancel and insert operations, add a button control to the template. 设置其下表中列出的属性的值之一。Set its property to one of the values listed in the following table. |按钮类型Button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-----------------|-----------------------| |取消Cancel|"取消""Cancel"| |InsertInsert|"插入""Insert"| 您可以控制中的插入项的位置控件中的使用属性。You can control the position of the insert item in the control by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义自定义模板的插入项控件。The following example shows how to define a custom template for the insert item of a control. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分事件。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以编程方式在数据源中插入项。Use the method to programmatically insert an item in the data source. 此方法通常用于将项目从外部控制，例如，从页面上的其他控件。This method is typically used to insert an item from outside the control, such as from a different control on the page. 若要使用方法，必须定义中的模板控件。To use the method, you must define an template in the control. 您还必须设置属性的值不同于。You must also set the property to a value different from . 若要指定是否在插入操作之前执行页验证，请使用`causesValidation`参数。To specify whether page validation is performed before the insert operation, use the `causesValidation` parameter. 此方法将引发和事件。This method raises the and events. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法以编程方式插入的插入项的内容到数据源的控件。The following example shows how to use the method to programmatically insert the contents of the insert item of a control into the data source. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 在请求取消操作之后、 控件取消插入或编辑操作之前发生。

span.span: Occurs when a cancel operation is requested, but before the control cancels the insert or edit operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将引发事件中的取消按钮时或单击模板时，之前控件取消插入或编辑操作。The control raises the event when a Cancel button in the or template is clicked, but before the control cancels the insert or edit operation. (取消按钮为的按钮控件属性设置为"Cancel"。)这使您可以执行自定义的例程，每当发生此事件，例如停止取消操作，如果它会将项放入不需要的状态。(A Cancel button is a button control whose property is set to "Cancel".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the item in an unwanted state. 一个对象传递给事件处理程序，使您能够确定项的索引。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the index of the item. 它还使您可以指示应停止取消操作。It also lets you indicate that the cancel operation should be stopped. 若要停止该操作，请设置的属性对象传递给`true`。To stop the operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建事件处理程序。The following example shows how to create an event handler. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含接受用户输入，这是潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This example contains text boxes that accept user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling/CS/ListViewItemCancelingCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling/VB/ListViewItemCancelingVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 当单击 控件中的按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a button in a control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的按钮时引发事件单击控件。The event is raised when a button in the control is clicked. 这使您可以在每次此事件发生时执行自定义例程。This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 中的按钮控件也可以调用控件的内置功能。Buttons in a control can also invoke built-in functionality of the control. 下表列出了可用于值为了调用内置功能按钮的属性。The following table lists values that you can use with the property of a button in order to invoke built-in functionality. |CommandName 值CommandName value|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |"取消""Cancel"|取消编辑或插入操作。Cancels an edit or insert operation. 引发 事件。Raises the event.| |“Delete”"Delete"|从数据源中删除当前记录。Deletes the current record from the data source. 将引发和事件。Raises the and events.| |"选择""Select"|集属性设置为的项的属性值。Sets the property to the property value for the item. 呈现的项模板。Renders the template for the item. 将引发和事件。Raises the and events.| |"编辑""Edit"|使项进入编辑模式。Puts the item in edit mode. 呈现的项模板。Renders the template for the item. 引发 事件。Raises the event.| |"插入""Insert"|将从绑定的值插入到数据源的模板。Inserts the bound values from the template into the data source. 将引发和事件。Raises the and events.| |"更新""Update"|使用中的绑定值更新数据源中的当前记录模板。Updates the current record in the data source with the bound values from the template. 将引发和事件。Raises the and events.| |"排序""Sort"|中列出的列进行排序`CommandArgument`按钮的属性。Sorts the columns listed in the `CommandArgument` property of the button. 将引发和事件。Raises the and events.| 单击上表中列出的按钮时，也会引发事件。The event is also raised when a button that is listed in the previous table is clicked. 但是，建议你使用的表中列出的事件。However, it is recommended that you use the events listed in the table. 事件通常用于处理自定义操作。The event is usually used to handle custom operations. 一个对象传递给事件处理程序，使您能够确定的命令名称和被单击的按钮的命令参数。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the command name and command argument of the button that was clicked. 若要确定命令名称，请使用属性。To determine the command name, use the property. 若要确定命令参数，请使用属性。To determine the command argument, use the property. 若要访问引发该事件的控件，请使用属性。To access the control that raised the event, use the property. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建事件处理程序。The following example shows how to create an event handler. summary.span: 在 控件中创建项时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an item is created in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前控件可以呈现，必须为控件中每个项创建对象。Before the control can be rendered, a object must be created for each item in the control. 引发事件中的每一项时创建控件。The event is raised when each item in the control is created. 这使您可以执行自定义的例程，每当发生此事件，如将自定义内容添加到项目。This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as adding custom content to an item. 一个对象传递给事件处理程序，使您可以访问的正在创建的项目的属性。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to access the properties of the item that is being created. 若要访问的项中的特定控件，请使用方法中包含的对象属性的对象。To access a specific control in the item, use the method of the object that is contained in the property of the object. 您可以确定哪一项类型 （数据项，插入项空项） 通过使用所创建属性。You can determine which item type (data item, insert item, empty item) is being created by using the property. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

summary.span: 在数据项绑定到 控件中的数据时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a data item is bound to data in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前控件可以呈现，在控件中的每个项必须绑定到数据源中的记录。Before the control can be rendered, each item in the control must be bound to a record in the data source. 数据项绑定到中的数据时引发事件控件。The event is raised when a data item is bound to data in the control. (由表示数据项对象。)这使您可以执行自定义的例程，每当发生此事件，例如修改的数据绑定到项的值。(Data items are represented by objects.) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as modifying the values of the data that is bound to the item. 一个对象传递给事件处理程序，使您可以访问要绑定的项的属性。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to access the properties of the item that is being bound. 若要访问的项中的特定控件，请使用方法中包含的对象属性的对象。To access a specific control in the item, use the method of the object that is contained in the property of the object. 您可以确定哪一项类型 （数据项，插入项空项） 所绑定的使用属性。You can determine which item type (data item, insert item, empty item) is being bound by using the property. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 事件。The following example shows how to use the event. summary.span: 在请求删除操作且 控件删除项之后发生。

span.span: Occurs when a delete operation is requested, after the control deletes the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击项的删除按钮时引发事件或调用方法，之后控件删除项。The event is raised when an item's Delete button is clicked or the method is called, after the control deletes the item. （“删除”按钮是 属性设置为“Delete”的按钮控件。）这使您可以执行自定义的例程，每当发生此事件，例如检查删除操作的结果。(A Delete button is a button control whose property is set to "Delete".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of the delete operation. 一个对象传递给事件处理程序，使您能够确定数据源中受影响的行数。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the number of rows that were affected in the data source. 它还允许您确定哪些异常可能发生。It also lets you determine what exceptions might have occurred. 您可以指示是否已在事件处理程序处理异常通过设置的属性对象传递给`true`。You can indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the property of the object to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何添加事件处理程序事件。The following example shows how to add an event handler for the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击项的删除按钮时引发事件或调用方法时，之前控件删除项。The event is raised when an item's Delete button is clicked or the method is called, but before the control deletes the item. （“删除”按钮是 属性设置为“Delete”的按钮控件。）这使您可以执行自定义的例程，每当发生此事件，如取消删除操作。(A Delete button is a button control whose property is set to "Delete".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the delete operation. 一个对象传递给事件处理程序，使您能够确定当前项的索引。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the index of the current item. 此外可以指示应取消删除操作。It also lets you indicate that the delete operation should be canceled. 若要取消删除操作，请设置的属性对象传递给`true`。To cancel the delete operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 此外可以使用和之前将值传递到数据源的集合。You can also work with the and collections before the values are passed to the data source. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式添加的事件处理程序事件。The following example shows how to declaratively add an event handler for the event. summary.span: 在请求插入操作且 控件在数据源中插入项之后发生。

span.span: Occurs when an insert operation is requested, after the control has inserted the item in the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将引发事件中的插入按钮时单击模板或调用方法，之后控件数据源中插入项。The control raises the event when an Insert button in the template is clicked or the method is called, after the control inserts the item in the data source. (插入按钮为的按钮控件属性设置为"插入"。)这使您可以执行自定义的例程，每当发生此事件，如检查插入操作的结果。(An Insert button is a button control whose property is set to "Insert".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of an insert operation. 一个对象传递给事件处理程序，使您能够确定受影响的记录数。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the number of records affected. 它还允许您确定哪些异常可能发生。It also lets you determine what exceptions might have occurred. 若要确定受影响的插入操作的记录数，请使用属性。To determine the number of records that were affected by the insert operation, use the property. 若要确定是否发生了任何异常，请使用属性。To determine whether any exceptions occurred, use the property. 您还可以指示是否已在事件处理程序处理异常通过设置属性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the property. 如果你想要访问插入的记录的值，使用属性。If you want to access the values of the inserted record, use the property. 如果属性会将报告未插入任何项，可以重新绑定到的插入值通过设置模板属性设置为`true`。If the property reports that no items were inserted, you can rebind the insert values to the template by setting the property to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何添加事件处理程序事件。The following example shows how to add an event handler for the event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将引发事件中的插入按钮时单击模板或调用方法时，之前控件插入记录。The control raises the event when an Insert button in the template is clicked or the method is called, but before the control inserts the record. (插入按钮为的按钮控件属性设置为"插入"。)这使您可以在发生此事件时，如 HTML 编码的记录的值插入数据源中之前执行自定义例程。(An Insert button is a button control whose property is set to "Insert".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as HTML-encoding the values of a record before it is inserted in the data source. 一个对象传递给事件处理程序，使您能够确定发送到的可选命令参数的值控件。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the value of an optional command argument sent to the control. 此外可以指示应取消插入操作。It also lets you indicate that the insert operation should be canceled. 若要取消插入操作，请设置属性设置为`true`。To cancel the insert operation, set the property to `true`. 可读取或修改新记录的字段值使用属性。You can read or modify the field values for the new record by using the property. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何添加事件处理程序事件。The following example shows how to add an event handler for the event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含接受用户输入，这是潜在的安全威胁的控件。This example contains controls that accept user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用来存储中的数据项控件。The property is used to store the data items in a control. 控件自动填充创建一个集合为数据源中数据的当前页中的每个记录的对象。The control automatically populates the collection by creating one object for each record in the current page of data in the data source. 然后，它将每个对象添加到集合中。It then adds each object to the collection. 若要访问控件中的特定项，或者用于循环访问的项的完整集合，通常使用此属性。This property is usually used to access a specific item in the control or to iterate though the complete collection of items. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用要访问在正在编辑的项集合控件。The following example shows how to use the collection to access the item that is being edited in a control. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分事件。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来定义自定义用户界面 (UI) 显示数据的项。Use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) to display the data items. 模板所需的控件。The template is required by the control. 它通常包含控件以显示一条记录的字段值。It usually contains controls to display the field values of a record. 如果你想要允许用户修改的数据，你通常还将按钮添加到模板，让用户选择的记录、 切换到编辑模式，或删除一条记录。If you want to let users modify the data, you also usually add buttons to the template that let the user select a record, switch to edit mode, or delete a record. 若要以声明方式指定自定义模板，添加`ItemTemplate`元素内的控件。To specify the custom template declaratively, add an `ItemTemplate` element inside the control. 然后可以添加到模板的内容`ItemTemplate`元素。You can then add the contents of the template to the `ItemTemplate` element. 若要显示字段值绑定到控件的数据源，请使用数据绑定表达式。To display the field values of the data source that is bound to the control, use a data-binding expression. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定表达式概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。For more information, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a). 若要创建执行内置选择的按钮，删除和编辑操作，添加一个按钮控件的模板。To create buttons that perform the built-in select, delete, and edit operations, add a button control to the template. 设置其下表中列出的属性的值之一。Set its property to one of the values listed in the following table. |按钮类型Button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-----------------|-----------------------| |删除Delete|“Delete”"Delete"| |EditEdit|"编辑""Edit"| |选择Select|"选择""Select"| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义自定义模板中的数据项控件。The following example shows how to define a custom template for a data item in the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中的根容器的自定义内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the custom content for the root container in a control.

value.span: 一个对象，包含 控件中的根容器的自定义内容。

span.span: An object that contains the custom content for the root container in a control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来定义自定义用户界面 (UI) 的根容器控件。Use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the root container of the control. 若要指定布局模板，添加`LayoutTemplate`元素内的控件。To specify the layout template, add a `LayoutTemplate` element inside the control. 然后可以添加到模板的内容`LayoutTemplate`元素。You can then add the contents of the template to the `LayoutTemplate` element. 内容必须包含一个占位符控件，例如表行 (`tr`) 由定义的项的元素模板或定义的组模板。The content must include a placeholder control such as a table row (`tr`) element for the items that are defined by the template or for groups that are defined by the template. 占位符控件必须具有`runat`属性设置为"server"和`ID`属性设置为值或属性，具体取决于是否控件是否使用组。The placeholder control must have the `runat` attribute set to "server" and the `ID` attribute set to the value of the or the property, depending on whether the control is using groups. 不需要模板控件。The template is not required by the control. 可以使用控制，而和也不与已知 ID 占位符服务器控件You can use the control without a and also without a placeholder server control with a known ID. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义自定义模板中的根容器控件。The following example shows how to define a custom template for the root container in the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate/CS/ListViewEditItemTemplateCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate/VB/ListViewEditItemTemplateVB.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用控件，而无需定义控件中的模板。The following example shows how to use the control without defining a template in the control. 具有已知 ID 的服务器控件还未指定。A server control with a known ID is also not specified. ``` <% Eval("LastName")%> ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由控件以根据需要处理通过控件层次结构向上传递的事件。The method is used by the control to optionally handle events that are passed up through the control hierarchy. 它将确定是否通过检查的属性来处理事件中包含的对象`e`参数。It determines whether to handle an event by examining the properties of the object that are contained in the `e` parameter. 当必须处理事件时，该方法将执行适当的操作。When an event must be handled, the method performs the appropriate action. 忽略其他事件并将其控件层次结构中向上传递。Other events are ignored and passed up the control hierarchy. 此方法的返回值指示要处理的事件还是要将该事件的控件层次结构向上传递。The return value of this method indicates whether to handle the event or to pass the event up the control hierarchy. 控件重写此方法以执行相应的操作，单击某一控件可识别的按钮时的基实现。The control overrides the base implementation of this method to perform the appropriate action when one of the buttons that is recognized by the control is clicked. 下表列出了按钮的控件可识别。The following table lists the buttons that the control recognizes. |CommandName 值CommandName value|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |"取消""Cancel"|取消编辑或插入操作。Cancels an edit or insert operation. 引发 事件。Raises the event.| |“Delete”"Delete"|从数据源中删除当前记录。Deletes the current record from the data source. 将引发和事件。Raises the and events.| |"选择""Select"|集属性设置为的项的属性值。Sets the property to the property value for the item. 呈现的项模板。Renders the template for the item. 将引发和事件。Raises the and events.| |"编辑""Edit"|使项进入编辑模式。Puts the item in edit mode. 呈现的项模板。Renders the template for the item. 引发 事件。Raises the event.| |"插入""Insert"|将从绑定的值插入到数据源的模板。Inserts the bound values from the template into the data source. 将引发和事件。Raises the and events.| |"更新""Update"|使用中的绑定值更新数据源中的当前记录模板。Updates the current record in the data source with the bound values from the template. 将引发和事件。Raises the and events.| |"排序""Sort"|中列出的列进行排序`CommandArgument`按钮的属性。Sorts the columns listed in the `CommandArgument` property of the button. 将引发和事件。Raises the and events.| 此版本的方法返回`true`如果其中一个按钮引发由控件处理的事件。This version of the method returns `true` if one of these buttons raises an event that is handled by the control. 浮升事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event bubbling, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当通过此方法通知，Web 服务器控件必须执行创建和设置实例所需的任何初始化步骤。When notified by this method, Web server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 在服务器控件的生命周期的此阶段，控件的视图状态未尚未被填充。In this stage of the server control's life cycle, the control's view state has not yet been populated. 此外，不能访问其他服务器控件时调用此方法，不管它是子级或父级此控件。Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent of this control. 要创建并可供访问，不保证具有其他服务器控件。Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还可使派生的类处理事件，而不必附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 当您重写派生类中调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When you override in a derived class, call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将引发单击控件中的取消按钮时的事件，但在退出之前插入或编辑模式。The control raises the event when a Cancel button in the control is clicked, but before exiting insert or edit mode. (取消按钮为的按钮控件属性设置为"Cancel"。)这使您可以执行自定义的例程，每当发生此事件，例如停止取消操作，如果它会将项放入不需要的状态。(A Cancel button is a button control whose property is set to "Cancel".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the item in an unwanted state. 调用方法控制引发事件。The method is called by the control to raise the event. 它通常由控件开发人员在扩展类。It is typically used by control developers when extending the class. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还可使派生的类处理事件，而不必附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生后的页属性更改时引发控件来使用设置新值方法。The event is raised when the page properties change, after the control sets the new values by using the method. 这使您可以执行自定义的例程，每当发生此事件，例如清除所选的项或执行自定义分页操作。This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as clearing the selected item or performing a custom paging operation. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

summary.span: 获取 控件中的选定项的数据键值。

span.span: Gets the data-key value for the selected item in a control.

value.span: 控件中的选定项的数据键值。

span.span: The data key for the selected item in a control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示当前未选择项。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that no item is currently selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置属性，则控件创建通过值或指定的字段或字段的值在控件中每个项的对象。When the property is set, the control creates a object for each item in the control by using the value or values of the specified field or fields. 随后将对象添加到控件的集合。The objects are then added to the control's collection. 通常情况下，属性用于检索对象中的特定数据项控件。Normally, the property is used to retrieve the object for a specific data item in the control. 但是，如果你想要仅检索对象的当前选定项，您可以使用的快捷方式的属性。However, if you want to retrieve only the object of the currently selected item, you can use the property as a shortcut. 使用属性等同于检索对象从集合中由指定索引处属性。Using the property is the same as retrieving the object from the collection at the index that is specified by the property. 此外可以使用属性直接检索当前选定项的数据键值。You can also use the property to retrieve the data-key value for the currently selected item directly. 如果要创建对象，并想要访问的第一个字段以外的键字段，请使用已编制索引属性中的属性的对象。If you are creating a object and you want to access a key field other than the first field, use the indexed property in the property of the object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用第二个键字段作为主/从方案中的参数。The following example shows how to use the second key field as a parameter in a master/detail scenario. 一个控件用于显示来自 AdventureWorks 数据库的产品库存表的记录。A control is used to display records from the Product Inventory table of the AdventureWorks database. 中选择一项时控件，该产品的详细信息显示在另一个控件。When an item is selected in the control, the details of the product are displayed in another control. 产品 id 是第二个键名称中第一个控件。ProductID is the second key name in the first control. 若要访问第二个键，代码使用的值`ProductInventoryListView.SelectedDataKey[1]`(`ProductInventoryListView.SelectedDataKey(1)`在 Visual Basic 中) 作为为对象。To access the second key, the code uses the value of `ProductInventoryListView.SelectedDataKey[1]` (`ProductInventoryListView.SelectedDataKey(1)` in Visual Basic) as the for the object. 又使用此参数对象控制的第二个控件绑定到。This parameter object is in turn used by the control that the second control is bound to. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedDataKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedDataKey/CS/ListViewSelectedDataKeyCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedDataKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedDataKey/VB/ListViewSelectedDataKeyVB.aspx#1)]

(但是，如果您手动进行数据绑定控件，你可能需要处理读取或设置此属性手动也。)(However, if you manually data-bind the control, you might have to handle reading or setting this property manually as well.) ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定是否中选择一项控件。The following example shows how to use the property to determine whether an item is selected in a control. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分方法。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the method. summary.span: 在单击项的“选择”按钮且 控件处理选择操作之后发生。

span.span: Occurs when an item's Select button is clicked, after the control handles the select operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击项的选择按钮时后, 引发事件控件处理选择操作。The event is raised when an item's Select button is clicked, after the control handles the select operation. (选择按钮为的按钮控件属性设置为"Select"。)这使您可以执行自定义的例程，每当发生此事件，例如有关当前选定项的信息更新状态标签。(A Select button is a button control whose property is set to "Select".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as updating a status label with information about the currently selected item. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建事件处理程序事件。The following example shows how create an event handler for the event. span.span: Occurs when an item's Select button is clicked, but before the control handles the select operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击项的选择按钮时，之前引发事件控件处理选择操作。The event is raised when an item's Select button is clicked, but before the control handles the select operation. (选择按钮为的按钮控件属性设置为"Select"。)这使您可以执行自定义的例程，每当发生此事件，如取消选择的操作。(A Select button is a button control whose property is set to "Select".) This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the select operation. > [!NOTE] > 以编程方式设置时不会引发此事件属性。This event is not raised when you programmatically set the property. 一个对象传递给事件处理程序，使您能够确定用户选择的项的索引。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the index of the item that was selected by the user. 此外可以指示应取消选择操作。It also lets you indicate that the selection operation should be canceled. 若要取消选择操作，请设置的属性对象传递给`true`。To cancel the selection operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建事件处理程序事件。The following example shows how create an event handler for the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来定义自定义用户界面 (UI) 中的选定项控件。Use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the selected item in a control. 通常用来显示的其他项区分开所选的项。The is usually used to differentiate the selected item from the other displayed items. 而不是呈现所选的项模板。 is rendered instead of the template for the selected item. 若要以声明方式指定自定义模板，添加`SelectedItemTemplate`元素内的控件。To specify the custom template declaratively, add a `SelectedItemTemplate` element inside the control. 然后可以添加到模板的内容`SelectedItemTemplate`元素。You can then add the contents of the template to the `SelectedItemTemplate` element. 若要显示字段值绑定到控件的数据源，请使用数据绑定表达式。To display the field values of the data source that is bound to the control, use a data-binding expression. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定表达式概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。For more information, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a). 您也可以添加到按钮。You can also add buttons to the . 若要创建用于执行内置删除或编辑操作的按钮，将按钮控件添加到的模板并设置其下表中列出的属性的值之一。To create buttons that perform the built-in delete or edit operations, add a button control to the template and set its property to one of the values listed in the following table. |按钮类型Button type|CommandName 值CommandName value| |-----------------|-----------------------| |删除Delete|“Delete”"Delete"| |EditEdit|"编辑""Edit"| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来定义中的选定项的内容控件。The following example shows how to use the property to define the contents of the selected item in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以设置为表示数据源的主键的字段名称的逗号分隔列表。The property can be set to a comma-separated list of field names that represent the primary key of the data source. 如果设置，控件将自动创建通过值或指定的字段或字段的值在控件中每个项的对象。If it is set, the control automatically creates a object for each item in the control by using the value or values of the specified field or fields. 随后将对象添加到控件的集合。The objects are then added to the control's collection. 通常情况下，属性用于获取对象中的特定数据项控件。Normally, the property is used to get the object for a specific data item in the control. 但是，如果你想要仅获取对象的当前选定项，您可以使用的快捷方式的属性。However, if you want to get only the object of the currently selected item, you can use the property as a shortcut. 您可以通过使用直接确定选定项的第一个键字段的数据键值属性。You can also directly determine the data-key value of the first key field of the selected item by using the property. 如果要创建对象，并想要访问的第一个字段，使用非键字段属性。If you are creating a object and want to access a key field other than the first field, use the property. 有关示例，请参阅属性。For an example, see the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用第一个键字段作为主/从方案中的参数。The following example shows how to use the first key field as a parameter in a master/detail scenario. 中选择一项时控件，属性将用作为对象。When an item is selected in the control, the property is used as the for the object. 又使用此参数对象控制的第二个控件绑定到。This parameter object is in turn used by the control that the second control is bound to. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemDeleting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemDeleting/CS/ListViewItemItemDeletingCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemDeleting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItemDeleting/VB/ListViewItemItemDeletingVB.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定键字段的值。The following example shows how to use the property to determine the value of the key field. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedValue/CS/ListViewSelectedValueCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedValue/VB/ListViewSelectedValueVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以编程方式对数据进行排序，显示在控件通过使用指定的排序表达式和方向。Use the method to programmatically sort the data that is displayed in the control by using the specified sort expression and direction. 排序表达式指定要排序的列。The sort expression specifies the column or columns to sort with. 若要对多个列进行排序，创建包含以逗号分隔的字段名称列表的排序表达式。To sort multiple columns, create a sort expression that contains a comma-separated list of field names. 排序方向可指示是否在升序或降序顺序执行排序。The sort direction indicates whether sorting is performed in ascending or descending order. 当你想要的内容进行排序时通常使用此方法控制从在控件外部，如从页面上的其他控件。You typically use this method when you want to sort the contents of the control from outside the control, such as from a different control on the page. 此方法还用于以编程方式设置的默认排序顺序控制首次呈现时。This method is also used to programmatically set a default sort order for the control when it is first rendered. 此方法将引发和事件。This method raises the and events. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来以编程方式对由多个数据字段的控件。The following example shows how to use the method to programmatically sort the control by multiple data fields. This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as customizing the sort expression. 一个对象传递给事件处理程序，使您能够确定列的排序表达式。A object is passed to the event handler, which enables you to determine the sort expression for the column. 此外可以指示应取消排序操作。It also lets you indicate that the sort operation should be canceled. 若要取消排序操作，请设置的属性对象传递给`true`。To cancel the sort operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建事件处理程序事件。The following example shows how create an event handler for the event. summary.span: 更新数据源中指定索引处的记录。

span.span: Updates the record at the specified index in the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以编程方式更新数据源中的指定索引处的记录。Use the method to programmatically update the record at the specified index in the data source. 当你想要更新从外部的记录时通常使用此方法控制，例如，从页面上的其他控件。You typically use this method when you want to update a record from outside the control, such as from a different control on the page. > [!NOTE] > 仅对于包含双向数据绑定输入的控件的项，可以调用此方法。This method can be called only for an item that contains a two-way data-bound input control. 有关双向绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information about two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). 若要指定是否在更新操作之前执行页验证，请使用`causesValidation`参数。To specify whether page validation is performed before the update operation, use the `causesValidation` parameter. 此方法将引发和事件。This method raises the and events. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法以编程方式更新数据源中的项。The following example shows how to use the method to programmatically update a item in the data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem/CS/ListViewUpdateItemCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem/VB/ListViewUpdateItemVB.aspx#1)]
